entry.title: Re 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝘂𝗮𝗹 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗿 Now that the previous Guild system/model has been abolished, it’s so important that ...
entry.summary:
Re 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝘂𝗮𝗹 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗿 Now that the previous Guild system/model has been abolished, it’s so important that we cultivate far more intuitive and frictionless pathways that empower members to become contributors (if they choose) https://twitter.com/zanedraas/status/1609673473382834176?s=46&t=axKLIi4-MTKwAfOPO0ZP7g https://t.co/MC5X2QEcQ2
Zane and Draas: Developer DAO currently operates under a ‘Guild’ model, and it’s largely optimized for contributors. Outside of this, there aren’t a lot of ways members can get involved. 𝗢𝗕𝗦𝗘𝗥𝗩𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 Guilds conflate contributors and non-contributors — often leading to some confusion. https://t.co/FEP8LMni0r

entry.summary: Re The 𝗗𝗗 𝗟𝗮𝗯𝘀 section is officially live in Discord ✅ It is comprised of forum-based channels — and over time, tasks and roles under DD Labs will be shared as forum posts. DAO members can then asks teams clarifying questions, and easily obtain context inside each post! ☺️ https://t.co/KTZ0yyv8uy
